name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Framework**, and RESTful APIs, with hands-on experience in database management using **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in building robust and scalable applications using **AWS**, alongside a solid understanding of **Elastic Stack** and **Elasticsearch** for efficient data processing and search functionalities. Experienced in Agile methodologies, fostering collaboration and effective communication within cross-functional teams.
Demonstrates strong problem-solving abilities and a commitment to quality through extensive unit and integration testing practices. Additionally, possesses a broad technical skillset including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in leading cloud-native application deployments and implementing microservices architecture, ensuring compliance with industry standards and enhancing system performance and security.
